text:
Hi Dan :slightly_smiling_face: you might have this already but you can also add a 'direction' field in search filters to get the latest modified records : `{`
        `"propertyName":"lastmodifieddate",`
`"direction": "DESCENDING"`
      `}`
HI everyone, quick question, is there a proper way to get all the engagements owned by X user (that does not involver getting ALL engagements and manually look for the ones i need)?

Hi Walter,

I think that you could use the CRM Associations API with Association type 9 (Contact to engagement).
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/crm-associations/crm-associations-overview>
I need a relationship with the owner of the task (a user) not with a contact
